channel.title: Advice for my RS Account
channel.description:
Hi MITB,
I have this old account from 2007. I want you to tell me what to do with it. Here is some pics:
Skills: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/t5lno5.png[/img]
Bank(Sucks IKR): [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1gssc3.jpg[/img]
HISTORY: I used to pk with it in early 2008. Was F2P. I became fucking rich from pking in F2P. In 2009, I became member. I was 60 mage by then. I went to Soul Wars and got 67. Then, I bought full infinity. I was helping my mate in an RSMV. So I brbed to get a snack. When i came back I found my sister playing on my account and she was killing a werewolf. Died and gf 5m. My mate teled B4 I died so no one helped me to get it. Now its 2010 and I came back to play on this account. I botted till now 15k rune ess. Made 1m(In picture) F2P atm. ==========
Thanks, B2300 T4nk

item.title: Advice for my RS Account
item.dc:creator: @Silent_Coder Silent Coder
item.description:
@Silent_Coder wrote:

Get 85 mining. I am not joking or trolling, you can make 255K in 10 minutes, rune mining isn’t as hard as people say.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice for my RS Account
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Some advice for your account.

Get a bank pin. That will save your ass more then you think.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice for my RS Account
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:13, topic:332539”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=428967.msg3155398#msg3155398 date=1268988794]
Keep defence at 44 and prayer at 45. Raise attack to 50 (and perhaps consider getting 60 down the track) and strength to 90+. Consider getting 85 magic for teleblock, too.
Once this is all done, pk on f2p.
[/quote]Thanks. 45 def for zerker :D[/quote]
Well you can do that too. There’s a lot more work involved though in making the account for p2p PVP, and I daresay you’ve already raised the stats too high to avoid ‘ruining’ the account (for example, you have to still get experience from numerous quests that you have, most likely, not done so far). I strongly doubt you’ll finish with 45 defence.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice for my RS Account
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:5, topic:332539”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=428967.msg3149523#msg3149523 date=1268418339]
PVP has become Pure vs Pure. Avoid getting your defense or prayer up. Stick with leveling range, defense and strength. You might also want to level something to make money and fund your pking trips. Bot it all the way.
[/quote] I make like 5k ess in 4 hrs. I’m thinking of keeping my bot on for like, 2 days. Btw you said level defence and avoid getting my defence up :P[/quote]
fixt. btw what bot are you using?

Read full topic

item.title: Advice for my RS Account
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:6, topic:332539”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=428967.msg3149526#msg3149526 date=1268418960]

[quote author=MujaheD link=topic=428967.msg3149523#msg3149523 date=1268418339]
PVP has become Pure vs Pure. Avoid getting your defense or prayer up. Stick with leveling range, defense and strength. You might also want to level something to make money and fund your pking trips. Bot it all the way.
[/quote] I make like 5k ess in 4 hrs. I’m thinking of keeping my bot on for like, 2 days. Btw you said level defence and avoid getting my defence up
[/quote]Wtf how do you make 5k ess in 4 hrs if a person with 70 mining gets around 600-700/hr botting? I call bs.[/quote]No breaks.

Read full topic
